definitions.MP4: MP4 is a digital multimedia container format...
definitions.ENCODE: Encoding is the process of converting data into a particular format...
definitions.MUX: Multiplexing is the process of combining multiple signals...
definitions.REMUX: Remuxing is the process of changing the container format without altering the actual data...
definitions.ENCRYPT: Encryption refers to the process of converting media streams into a secure format using algorithms like AES 128-bit, ensuring only authorized parties can decrypt and access the content.
